name: Gumm Bearto
description:
Throw yourself to move through the scenario and get that magazine that you have a wish for, but remember to come back home after!

This game was a project for Feevale University based on the theme "Something is not right" and it was made in 3 weeks. 

Coding: Júnior Mercker

Artists: Luiz Andrade, Richard Pierre, Wesley Trindade, Vitor Lopes
